Interface RealDoubleMatrixStorage

All Superinterfaces:
MatrixStorage<Real>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectRealDoubleMatrixStorage, HeapRealDoubleMatrixStorage
public interface RealDoubleMatrixStorage extends MatrixStorage<Real>
Optimized storage for double-precision real matrices.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
